remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可以由移动控件开发人员以显示控件的新设备上或针对新的标记标准。The class can be used by mobile control developers to display an control on new devices or for new markup standards. 有关详细信息，请参阅[控件和适配器交互](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c330dabc-7e28-40bc-b777-101a5c6fa982)。For more information, see [Control and Adapter Interaction](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c330dabc-7e28-40bc-b777-101a5c6fa982).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现方法调用方法的相应控件适配器，又可以回调方法或方法进行控制，或创建其自己特定于设备的模板化用户界面。The default implementation of the method calls the method of the corresponding control adapter, which in turn can either call back the method or the method for the control, or create its own device-specific templated UI.

span.span: if the event was handled; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收回发事件通知，以检查事件是否是特定于适配器时，将由控件调用此方法。This method is called by a control when it receives a postback event notification, to check whether the event is adapter-specific. 如果该控件实现方法，并接收回发事件，调用的控件适配器的方法。If the control implements the method and receives a postback event, the method of the control adapter is called. 如果向控件发送的事件而异的目标设备，必须调用此方法的控件实现控件适配器的方法。If events sent to the control can vary depending on the target device, the control implementation of this method must call the method of the control adapter. 此方法返回`true`或`false`，以指示设备适配器是否已处理该事件。This method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether the device adapter handled the event. 它将返回`false`默认情况下。It returns `false` by default.

span.span: the postback data is invalid.

related.span: 自适应控件行为的体系结构概述

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段中，这是一个内部字段且具有值"__more*n*"，其中`n`是一个数字，在呈现期间创建。The field, which is an internal field and has the value "__more*n*", where `n` is a number, is created during rendering. 此字段被当做字段，只不过它指定要在详细信息视图中显示的项的索引。This field is used like the field, except that it specifies the index of the item to display in details view. 移动控件开发人员使用字段。The field is used by mobile control developers.

related.span: 自适应控件行为的体系结构概述
